attributes.action: give more access rights to fathers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a single dad i know what its like not to be able to see your children but after a long fight i won custody of my children. all dads should be given a automatic right to see their children and any mothers who stop without good reason should be punished.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/FatherEquality/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
